enhanced_description: Green Thumbs, established in 2012, is an HR technology and consulting service provider offering customized solutions to help organizations grow their people and business. They specialize in talent management, learning & development, and diversity & inclusion. Key offerings include 360-degree feedback solutions, scientifically designed assessments for talent acquisition and selection, and employee engagement surveys. Green Thumbs aims to empower companies to build high-performance workforces, foster diversity, and convert employees into brand ambassadors.
